SELECT t.hospital_id, t.province, t.city, t.lng, t.lat, t.hospital_name, t.hospital_level, t1.dept_name, t2.doctor_name, t2.doctor_intro, t2.field, t2.positional,
(SELECT count(1) FROM hospital_guahao_log t3 WHERE t3.hospital_id=t.hospital_id) appointment_num
(SELECT count(1) FROM hospital_guahao_log t3 WHERE t3.doctor_code = t2.doctor_code) appointment_num
FROM hospital t LEFT JOIN hospital_dept t1 ON t1.hospital_id = t.hospital_id LEFT JOIN hospital_doctor t2 ON t2.dept_id = t1.dept_id
group by hospital_id
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
hospital_id desc
